greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of k-regular graphs on n labeled nodes with loops allowed, n >= 1, 0 <= k <= n + 1.
comment: A loop adds 2 to the degree of its vertex.
xref: Columns k=0..4 are A000012, A123023, A108246, A110039 (with interspersed zeros), A228697.
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Mar 09 2020
